name: 3 in the morning
description:
3AM  - A young man stands in his bedroom. It seems like one of his friends has come by to visit him by surprise. Or is it his birthday again ? A little Homestuck fangame, one minute long or a little more if you want to take your time.

This game has been made with Adam Ledoux's Bitsy application for the Micro Fangame Jam.

HOMESTUCK is a webcomic by Andrew Hussie, it's a few hundred pages of content, but it's never too late to start. The song you can hear in the rain is a slow-mo version of Three in the Morning (RJ's I Can Barely Sleep In This Casino Remix) by Robert J! Lake (a remix of the song Three in the morning by Clark "Plazmataz" Powell).
